skills.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pyke's''' {{sti|health|{{as|'''maximum''' health}}}} cannot increase except through [[Growth#Increasing_Statistics|growth (per level)]], instead he gains{{ft|{{sti|{{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage}}}} {{as|per 14 '''bonus''' health}}.|{{as|({{fd|7.143}}% '''bonus''' health)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.}}

'''Pyke''' also stores 10% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 1 Lethality)}} of the {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} he takes from enemy champions as ''Grey Health'' on his [[health bar]], increased to 35% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per 1 Lethality)}} if there are two or more {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champions nearby and storing up to 80 {{as|(+ 800% '''bonus''' AD)}} ''Grey Health'', with an upper cap of {{as|60% of his '''maximum''' health}}.
When '''Pyke''' is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to enemies, he rapidly consumes his ''Grey Health'' to {{tip|heal}} for the same amount.
'''Pyke''' gains {{as|1 '''bonus''' movement speed}} while in the river.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Pyke's maximum health cannot increase except through Growth#Increasing_Statistics, instead he gains
Pyke also stores 10% (+ 0.25% per 1 Lethality) of the post-mitigation damage he takes from enemy champions as Grey Health on his health bar, increased to 35% (+ 0.5% per 1 Lethality) if there are two or more visible enemy champions nearby and storing up to 80 (+ 800% bonus AD) Grey Health, with an upper cap of 60% of his maximum health.
When Pyke is not visible to enemies, he rapidly consumes his Grey Health to heal for the same amount.
Pyke gains 1 bonus movement speed while in the river.
skills.notes:
* Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g {{ri|Overgrowth}}) will increase the health before getting converted by ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'', thus granting increased {{as|bonus AD}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Gift of the Drowned Ones's'' healing cap.
*'''Pyke's''' ''Grey Health'' does not have a time limit, and will stay on his {{as|health bar}} until '''Pyke''' leaves enemy vision or dies.
* Since '''Pyke's''' '''maximum''' health cannot be increased, ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'' reaches the upper cap of {{as|60% of '''maximum''' health}} at {{pp|(0.6*({{ccd|Pyke|hp_base}}+{{ccd|Pyke|hp_lvl}}*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))-80)/8|color=ad}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
* {{tip|Untargetable}} champions count towards '''Pyke's''' modified ''Grey Health'' storing.
* The maximum amount of additional ''Grey Health'' storing gained possible from all lethality sources is {{fd|69.5%}} at {{as|139 lethality}}. This is reduced to {{fd|34.75%}} while there are fewer than two enemy champions nearby.
** '''Relevant mathematics:'''
*** {{ii|Prowler's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|10.5%}}'''|21 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|5.25%}}'''|21 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
**** {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|14.5}}%'''|29 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|7.25%}}'''|29 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
**** {{tt|Maximum|Prowler's Claw + 5 other Legendary Items}} Mythic Passive Bonuses: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|12.5%}}'''|25 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|6.25%}}'''|25 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''9%'''|18 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|4.5%}}'''|18 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
**** {{ii|Draktharr's Shadowcarver}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''13%'''|26 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|6.5}}%'''|26 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Eclipse}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''9%'''|18 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|4.5%}}'''|18 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
**** {{ii|Syzygy}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''13%'''|26 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|6.5%}}'''|26 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Sanguine Blade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''9%'''|18 × 0.005}} health storing while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is active, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|4.5%}}'''|18 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
**** '''+''' {{tt|'''5%'''|10 × 0.005}} health storing while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is inactive, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|2.5%}}'''|10 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Serpent's Fang}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''9%'''|18 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|4.5%}}'''|18 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''9%'''|18 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|4.5%}}'''|18 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|The Collector}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''6%'''|12 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''3%'''|12 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Umbral Glaive}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''6%'''|12 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''3%'''|12 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Edge of Night}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''5%'''|10 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|2.5%}}'''|10 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ii|Serrated Dirk}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''5%'''|10 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|2.5%}}'''|10 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
*** {{ri|Sudden Impact}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|3.5%}}'''|7 × 0.005}} health storing, reduced to {{tt|'''{{fd|1.75%}}'''|7 × 0.0025}} for fewer than two enemy champions nearby
**** '''Total Increased Percent''': {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw|{{fd|14.5%}}}} + {{tt|{{fd|12.5%}}|Mythic passive}} + {{ii|Sanguine Blade|9%}} + {{ii|Serpent's Fang|9%}} + {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade|9%}} + {{ii|The Collector|6%}} + {{ii|Umbral Glaive|6%}} + {{ri|Sudden Impact|{{fd|3.5%}}}} = '''{{fd|69.5%}}''' health storing
***** '''Total Health Storing''': {{fd|69.5%}} + 35% = '''{{fd|104.5%}}'''
* Amount of attack damage granted from list of items that grants health, converted with ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'':

{{Item stat table|pykehealth}}

skills.name: Bone Skewer
skills.target_range: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{pp|type=channel time|400;400 to 1100 for 7|0;0.4 to 1|formula=400+(116.67 per 0.1 seconds, starting at 0.4 seconds). ''This is capped at 1 second.''}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20% for up to 3 seconds to increase ''Bone Skewer's'' {{sti|range}} over the first second of the channel. ''Bone Skewer'' can be recast at any time within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|projectile|hurls}} his harpoon in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy struck, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them {{tt|towards his direction|The pull can fling an enemy behind Pyke if the harpoon hits at close range}}, during which they are also {{tip|sight|revealed}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90% for 1 second.

Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.4}} seconds causes '''Pyke''' to instead thrust his blade in the target direction, dealing the same damage to the closest enemy {{tip|champion}}, or closest enemy if no champion is hit.

If '''Pyke''' is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Bone Skewer'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full {{sti|cooldown}} but {{sti|mana|{{as|half of its mana cost}}}} is refunded.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pyke charges while being slowed by 20% for up to 3 seconds to increase Bone Skewer's range over the first second of the channel. Bone Skewer can be recast at any time within its duration.
Recast: Pyke hurls his harpoon in the target direction, dealing physical damage to the first enemy struck, pulling them towards his direction, during which they are also revealed, and slowing them by 90% for 1 second.
Releasing the ability within 0.4 seconds causes Pyke to instead thrust his blade in the target direction, dealing the same damage to the closest enemy champion, or closest enemy if no champion is hit.
If Pyke is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Bone Skewer is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but half of its mana cost is refunded.
skills.notes:
* Only the charged version of ''Bone Skewer'' will be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* {{si|Flash}} can be used during the cast time and ''Bone Skewer'' will affect enemies at the new location.
* '''Pyke''' can still use [[summoner spell]]s besides {{si|Flash}}, {{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Hexflash}}, and {{si|Mark}} / {{si|Dash}} while hurling the harpoon but he cannot perform any other action.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Pyke''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|cast=interrupts|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can use trinkets}}

skills.name: Ghostwater Dive
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' submerges into water, entering {{tip|camouflage}} for 5 seconds and gaining {{as|40%|ms}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% per 1 Lethality)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over the duration. Enemies are notified if '''Pyke''' is within 1500 units of them.
Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends ''Ghostwater Dive''.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pyke submerges into water, entering camouflage for 5 seconds and gaining 40% (+ 1.5% per 1 Lethality) bonus movement speed that decays over the duration. Enemies are notified if Pyke is within 1500 units of them.
Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends Ghostwater Dive.
skills.notes:
* When '''Pyke''' is hidden nearby in his ''Ghostwater Dive'', sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played, changing based on the amount of health they have left.
** Enemies will hear a warning tone if their health bar is under the threshold of {{ai|Death from Below|Pyke}}.
* The maximum amount of {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} gained possible from all lethality sources is {{as|{{fd|208.5%}}|ms}} at 139 lethality.
** '''Relevant mathematics:'''
*** {{ii|Prowler's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|31.5%}}'''|21 × 0.015}} bonus MS
**** {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|43.5%}}'''|29 × 0.015}} bonus MS
**** {{tt|Maximum|Prowler's Claw + 5 other Legendary Items}} Mythic Passive Bonuses: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|37.5%}}'''|25 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27%'''|18 × 0.015}} bonus MS
**** {{ii|Draktharr's Shadowcarver}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''39%'''|26 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Eclipse}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27%'''|18 × 0.015}} bonus MS
**** {{ii|Syzygy}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''39%'''|26 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Sanguine Blade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27%'''|18 × 0.015}} bonus MS while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is active
**** '''+''' {{tt|'''15%'''|10 × 0.015}} bonus MS while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is inactive
*** {{ii|Serpent's Fang}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27%'''|18 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27%'''|18 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|The Collector}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''18%'''|12 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Umbral Glaive}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''18%'''|12 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Edge of Night}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''15%'''|10 × 0.015}} bonus MS
*** {{ii|Serrated Dirk}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''15%'''|10 × 0.015}} bonus MS 
*** {{ri|Sudden Impact}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|10.5%}}'''|7 × 0.015}} bonus MS
**** '''Total Increased Percent''': {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw|{{fd|43.5%}}}} + {{tt|{{fd|37.5%}}|Mythic passive}} + {{ii|Sanguine Blade|27%}} + {{ii|Serpent's Fang|27%}} + {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade|27%}} + {{ii|The Collector|18%}} + {{ii|Umbral Glaive|18%}} + {{ri|Sudden Impact|{{fd|10.5%}}}} = '''{{fd|208.5%}}''' bonus MS
***** '''Total Bonus Movement Speed''': {{fd|208.5%}} + 40% = '''{{fd|248.5%}}'''

skills.name: Phantom Undertow
skills.effect_radius: {{tip|er|icononly = true}} {{tt|110|Phantom unit checking for nearby units}}
skills.speed: {{tt|3000|Both dash and returning phantom's missile speed}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the target direction, leaving behind a ''Phantom'' for 1 second.

Afterwards, the ''Phantom'' returns to '''Pyke''', {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies around it and those it passes through along the way for {{fd|1.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 10 Lethality)}} seconds. Enemy {{tip|Champion|champions}} also take {{as|physical damage}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pyke dashes a fixed distance in the target direction, leaving behind a Phantom for 1 second.
Afterwards, the Phantom returns to Pyke, stunning enemies around it and those it passes through along the way for 1.25 (+ 0.1 per 10 Lethality) seconds. Enemy champions also take physical damage.
skills.notes:
* The {{tip|dash}} distance can be extended to up to 900 units (estimated) when targeting across terrain.
* Like most [[missiles|projectiles]], the flying ''Phantom'' cannot hit targets whose {{tip|center range|center}} is behind the position it originates at or beyond the position it catches up to '''Pyke''' at, but the spell ''can'' hit targets behind its origin as long as their {{tip|edge range|hitbox radius}} overlaps with the original unit ''Phantom's'' 110-radius check at the end of its lifespan.
* The maximum increase in {{tip|stun}} duration possible from all lethality sources is {{fd|1.39}} seconds at 139 lethality, with the base duration included for a total of {{fd|2.64}} seconds.
** '''Relevant mathematics:'''
*** {{ii|Prowler's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.21}}'''|(21 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
**** {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.29}}'''|(29 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
**** {{tt|Maximum|Prowler's Claw + 5 other Legendary Items}} Mythic Passive Bonuses: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.25}}'''|(25 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.18}}'''|(18 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
**** {{ii|Draktharr's Shadowcarver}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.26}}'''|(26 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Eclipse}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.18}}'''|(18 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
**** {{ii|Syzygy}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.26}}'''|(26 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Sanguine Blade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.18}}'''|(18 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is active
**** '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.10}}'''|(10 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is inactive
*** {{ii|Serpent's Fang}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.18}}'''|(18 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.18}}'''|(18 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|The Collector}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.12}}'''|(12 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Umbral Glaive}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.12}}'''|(12 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Edge of Night}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.10}}'''|(10 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ii|Serrated Dirk}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.10}}'''|(10 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
*** {{ri|Sudden Impact}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|0.07}}'''|(7 ÷ 10) × 0.1}} seconds
**** '''Total Increased Duration''': {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw|{{fd|0.29}}}} + {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Mythic passive}} + {{ii|Sanguine Blade|{{fd|0.18}}}} + {{ii|Serpent's Fang|{{fd|0.18}}}} + {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade|{{fd|0.18}}}} + {{ii|The Collector|{{fd|0.12}}}} + {{ii|Umbral Glaive|{{fd|0.12}}}} + {{ri|Sudden Impact|{{fd|0.07}}}} = '''{{fd|1.39}}''' seconds
***** '''Total Stun Duration''': ''{{fd|1.39}} + {{fd|1.25}}'' = '''{{fd|2.64}}''' seconds

skills.name: Death from Below
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' marks the target location with an ''X'' before striking it, {{ccs|{{tip|execute|executing|noimg=true}}|true}} enemy {{tip|champions}} within the area that are below {{as|{{pp|250;290;330;370;400;430;450;470;490;510;530;540;550|6 to 18}}|health}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}} per 1 Lethality)}} {{sti|{{as|health}}}} while dealing{{ft|50% of the amount as {{as|physical damage}}|{{as|{{pp|125;145;165;185;200;215;225;235;245;255;265;270;275|6 to 18}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.75}} per 1 Lethality)}} {{as|physical damage}}}}to non-champion enemies and enemy champions whose health is not under the threshold for execution.

If ''Death from Below'' hits an enemy {{tip|champion}} or one {{tip|death|dies}} inside it, '''Pyke''' will {{tip|blink}} to the center of the ''X''. For the latter case '''Pyke''' also gains the ability to recast within 20 seconds at no cost.

Each ''execution'' grants one {{ii|'Your Cut'}} to both '''Pyke''' and the last assisting ally, instead of its natural [[assist]] {{g|gold}}. In addition, each enemy champion killed inside the ''X'' by an ally grants '''Pyke''' two stacks of {{ii|'Your Cut'}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Pyke marks the target location with an X before striking it, executing / true">Unknown value: ccs / executing / true enemy champions within the area that are below 6 to 18 ‒ undefined (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 1.5 per 1 Lethality) health while dealingto non-champion enemies and enemy champions whose health is not under the threshold for execution.
If Death from Below hits an enemy champion or one dies inside it, Pyke will blink to the center of the X. For the latter case Pyke also gains the ability to recast within 20 seconds at no cost.
Each execution grants one The item: 'Your Cut' to both Pyke and the last assisting ally, instead of its natural assist gold. In addition, each enemy champion killed inside the X by an ally grants Pyke two stacks of The item: 'Your Cut'.
skills.notes:
* Applies {{tip|raw damage}} to executed targets and {{tip|area damage}} to targets above the threshold.
* ''Death from Below'' cannot execute {{tip|clone|clones}}. They are always dealt 50% {{as|physical damage}}.
* Only the target's current health will count as '''Pyke's''' damage in post-game statistics and {{sti|spell vamp}} healing if executed.
** If the target's current health is less than 50% of the {{tt|post-mitigation|after damage modifiers}} non-executing damage, '''Pyke''' will heal less from spell vamp.
* If the target is saved by {{tip|resurrection}} or is in a {{tip|zombie state}}, ''Death from Below'' does not grant {{ii|'Your Cut'}} nor the recast.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent '''Pyke''' from {{tip|blink|blinking}}.
* If an enemy champion dies inside the ''X'' before ''Death from Below'' performs, '''Pyke''' will be shown as having received an assist in the kill feed, but this will not grant him {{tip|takedown}} effects.
* ''Death from Below'' cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}; '''Pyke''' will always appear at the target location if enemy champions are caught inside the ''X'' even if he is moved (e.g. by being {{tip|airborne|displaced}}) during the cast time.
** The only exception is if he is being {{tip|suppression|suppressed}}, in which case he will not {{tip|blink}}.
* The maximum execution threshold increase gained possible from all lethality sources is {{as|{{fd|208.5}} health}} at 139 lethality.
** '''Relevant mathematics:'''
*** {{ii|Prowler's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|31.5}}'''|21 × 1.5}} health
**** {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|43.5}}'''|29 × 1.5}} health
**** {{tt|Maximum|Prowler's Claw + 5 other Legendary Items}} Mythic Passive Bonuses: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|37.5}}'''|25 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27'''|18 × 1.5}} health
**** {{ii|Draktharr's Shadowcarver}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|39}}'''|26 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|Eclipse}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27'''|18 × 1.5}} health
**** {{ii|Syzygy}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|39}}'''|26 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|Sanguine Blade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27'''|18 × 1.5}} health while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is active
**** '''+''' {{tt|'''15'''|10 × 1.5}} health while {{sbc|Frenzy}} is inactive
*** {{ii|Serpent's Fang}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27'''|18 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''27'''|18 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|The Collector}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''18'''|12 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|Umbral Glaive}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''18'''|12 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|Edge of Night}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''15'''|10 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ii|Serrated Dirk}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''15'''|10 × 1.5}} health
*** {{ri|Sudden Impact}}: '''+''' {{tt|'''{{fd|10.5}}'''|7 × 1.5}} health
**** '''Total Increased Execution Threshold''': {{ii|Sandshrike's Claw|{{fd|43.5}}}} + {{tt|{{fd|37.5}}|Mythic passive}} + {{ii|Sanguine Blade|27}} + {{ii|Serpent's Fang|27}} + {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade|27}} + {{ii|The Collector|18}} + {{ii|Umbral Glaive|18}} + {{ri|Sudden Impact|{{fd|10.5}}}} = '''{{fd|208.5}}''' health
***** '''Total Execution Threshold''': {{fd|208.5}} + {{pp|250;290;330;370;400;430;450;470;490;510;530;540;550|6 to 18}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} = '''{{pp|458.5;498.5;538.5;578.5;608.5;638.5;658.5;678.5;698.5;718.5;738.5;748.5;758.5|6 to 18}}''' {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}
